details.name: Kactus
details.ability_desc: When owner stays still for 6s, they will restore 10EP/s. Restoratioons stops once 100 EP is restored or upon movement/jumping

details.name: Fang
details.ability_desc: Receive EP/HP whenever a teammate is knocked down by an enemy.

details.name: Hoot
details.ability_desc: Increases the range and duration of scanning items and skills. No skill cooldown.ho

details.name: Finn
details.ability_desc: When a nearby player is knocked down or eliminated, owner and teammates will receive a movement speed boost.

details.name: Zasil
details.ability_desc: Every time owner consumes an Inhaler/Med Kit/Repair Kit, there"s a possibility of getting an additional one.

details.name: Avron
details.ability_desc: Detect the number of enemies in an area, no matter what position they are in.

details.name: Flash
details.ability_desc: Reduces damage (From FF Knife and bullets) taken from behind

details.name: Yeti
details.ability_desc: Reduces damage taken from explosives

details.name: Agent Hop
details.ability_desc: Gain EP every time the Safe Zone shrinks.

details.name: Sensei Tig
details.ability_desc: Reduces the duration of enemies" man-marking skills.

details.name: DR.Beanie
details.ability_desc: Move quicker when you walk like Dr.Beanine.

details.name: Moony
details.ability_desc: Protection during interaction countdown

details.name: Dreki
details.ability_desc: Opponents recovering behind a wall will be exposed.

details.name: Beaston
details.ability_desc: With Beaston by your side, you gain greater strength in your throws!

details.name: Rockie
details.ability_desc: Reduce cooldown time of active skills for its owner.

details.name: MR.Waggor
details.ability_desc: Produces Gloo Wall grenades in Clash Squad, and provides Gloo Maker EXP in Battle Royale.

details.name: Falco
details.ability_desc: Disables enemy auto-aim while the owner is parachuting.

details.name: Ottero
details.ability_desc: When using Treatment Pistol or Med Kit, the receiver will recover some EP as well.

details.name: Robo
details.ability_desc: Adds a shield to the gloo wall.

details.name: Spirit Fox
details.ability_desc: Restore extra HP when using a Med Kit.

details.name: Shiba
details.ability_desc: Shiba will find the surrounding mushrooms and mark them on the mini map.

details.name: Panda
details.ability_desc: The Panda has all kinds of surprises!

details.name: Night Panther
details.ability_desc: Evey time the panther does a weight training, the owner can get more inventory space in-game.
